about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a commitment to creating intuitive user experiences. With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I transform ideas into clean, efficient, and scalable code.

background.title: Background
description: I'm a passionate frontend developer with several years of experience in creating modern web applications. My journey in web development started with a curiosity about how websites work, which led me to dive deep into the world of frontend development.

I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly interfaces using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I'm particularly interested in creating seamless user experiences and optimizing web performance.

items.description: Focused on software development and web technologies. Participated in various programming projects and competitions.

items.title: Snapgram (Social Media)
items.description: A social media platform built with React.js and TypeScript
items.longDescription: A modern social app with a stunning UI with a native mobile feel, a special tech stack, an infinite scroll feature, and amazing performance using React JS, Appwrite, TypeScript, and more.
features: Post creation and editing and deleting

items.title: Kalin Lash (E-commerce)
items.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React.js and TypeScript
items.longDescription: A modern e-commerce website featuring advanced product search, smart categorization, a user-friendly shopping cart, and a secure payment system. The website also includes a blog section to provide valuable and relevant content to users. My role in this project involved designing and developing the core functionalities using React and TypeScript. The main goal was to deliver a simple and enjoyable online shopping experience for users.

items.title: Hakar (Entrepreneurship services)
items.description: A platform for finding entrepreneurship services
items.longDescription: A social media website featuring a sleek, minimalist design and an immersive mobile-app-like experience. Key features include infinite scrolling for seamless content viewing, optimized performance, and an engaging user experience. This project was built as a portfolio showcase, leveraging modern technologies like React.js, Appwrite, TypeScript, and other advanced tools. My role involved designing and developing the user interface and implementing functional logic with a strong focus on delivering a smooth user experience.

items.title: ICL (analyzing chats of depressed people)
items.description: A website for analyzing chats of depressed people
items.longDescription: A website designed to analyze conversations of depressed individuals, allowing trainees to review chats and generate detailed reports on the causes and reasons for depression. These reports are stored and analyzed to aid in the development of artificial intelligence models. I was responsible for designing the entire UI/UX of the website from scratch, implementing core functionalities such as chat review, report creation, and data storage, and ensuring optimal performance and scalability using Next.js and TypeScript.
